channel.title: This blog on Gonzalo's thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in This blog on Gonzalo's thoughts

item.title: Future
item.description: More than six years ago I started this blog. I wanted to practice my English so that I would improve it. Four years later I came to London and sort of abandoned it, thinking that working in an English speaking environment would be enough to practice.

item.title: The future of this blog
item.description: When I started this blog, I had a goal. I needed to practice my English, because I wanted to go abroad. Months (or even years) later, more reasons appeared. First, I discovered that writing about solutions to job related problems could give people a way to solve their own problems more easily.

item.title: Three months later
item.description: Yes. It’s been three months since I wrote my previous post. When I started to write this blog I knew it could end like other blogs I have started. But I didn’t think I was going to stop writing so fast.

item.title: What is this?
item.description: Starting a blog it’s a difficult task. It’s not nearly as difficult as keeping updating it, of course. I have started a couple of blogs. Both are abandoned. Not a good track.
